## Built with...

- 🚀️ React for the UI
- 🏅️ Firebase real-time database
- 💎️ Tailwind CSS for modern look
- ⏲️ Auth0 authentication
- 🔥 Admin Panel
- 📸 Fakestore API
- 🎉️ and much more.
